snippet: The French hope to force elections and access to aid in the chronically dysfunctional  Central African Republic, which has suffered months of violence.
abstract: France is drafting United Nations Security Council resolution aimed at stabilizing Central African Republic, which has been plagued by months of lawless rampaging and dire shortages.
lead_paragraph: The French hope to force elections and access to aid in the chronically dysfunctional  Central African Republic, which has suffered months of violence.

headline.main: France Moves to Shore Up African State in Turmoil
headline.print_headline: France Moves To Shore Up African State In Turmoil
